author: holiman
content: The benchmarks are available as json files here: https://github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/tree/master/core/vm/testdata/precompiles . Happy to answer any questions

author: holiman
content: (the new benchmarks for 4844 are not yet in master branch. Those are on eip-4844 on `holiman` fork of go-ethereum)

author: pawandhananjay
content: Hey <@898563924440543283> , i'm trying to start a local testnet with this branch. For some reason, it's not starting the auth server. I have set the ttd in my `genesis.json` .

author: henridf
content:
What's the status of `SHARDING_FORK_{VERSION,EPOCH}` ? 

They're not in the consensus-specs repo, yet they are in https://github.com/eth-clients/eth2-networks/blob/master/shared/mainnet/config.yaml#L43

author: henridf
content: (and the current SHARDING_FORK_VERSION in eth2-networks collides with EIP4844_FORK_VERSION in consensus-specs...)

author: hsiaowei
content: It is not in use anywhere. CL spec `sharding` is the full dandsharding draft now, but we haven't added `fork.md` yet. We likely won't need `SHARDING_FORK_{VERSION,EPOCH}` config before EIP-4844 is done.

author: henridf
content: ok - I have a PR open ( https://github.com/eth-clients/eth2-networks/pull/81) to add `EIP4844_FORK_VERSION` there; currently it bumps `SHARDING_FORK_VERSION` but I guess the correct thing to do would be to remove it altogether then.

author: henridf
content: I know Nimbus has refs to `SHARDING_FORK_VERSION` but we might remove it there; do any other clients foresee issues if we remove SHARDING_FORK_VERSION from the eth2-networks config?

author: inphi
content: hey dcbuilder. Devnet v2 is no longer healthy and one can no longer peer with it. Once CL clients are ready I'll prepare another guide for devnet v3.
